Name: Dragon Simulator Multiplayer
About the game: Welcome to the World of Dragons. Dragon Simulator Multiplayer is a 3D simulator game in which you fight in PVP battles against other dragons or finish off AI characters that shoot from the ground. You can also play a cooperative game mode in which you have to kill zombies and collect their souls. Features Controllable mighty dragon 3 maps to play Multiple dragon skins Multiple dragon attacks: fireball, fire breath, and special 4 game modes: death-match, team death-match, Battle Royale, Zombie mode (cooperative) Day and night time options
